name: Knights Of Chaos
description:
*Note: HTML version of this game is slightly bugged. For the best experience, please download the game. Cheers!

Uh oh! The evil Aliskulls are trying to steal the orb of chaos! Team up with 4 chaotic elemental knights to protect the orb!

Submitted as part of the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Theme: Let There Be Chaos

Controls:

Mouse + Left Click: Select a Knight + Shoot

Check out how the game was made here!
